page.title: 19DIDSBURY FESTIVAL
page.content: An annual event held in Didsbury Manchester is the Didsbury Festival. A procession of decorated floats and local groups marches through the village accompanied by a band of musicians. The procession ends in a local park where there are sideshows and fun rides for everyone to enjoy. The festival was started many years ago and is connected with the old 'wakes weeks' holidays. About thirty years ago the festival was known as Didsbury Show and was a large local agricultural show. It included show jumping, dog classes, pet classes, flower and vegetable classes, as well as livestock classes. There were other attractions too including food and drink and sideshows and exhibitions. It was a major day out for many folk in the Didsbury area and was held on August Bank Holiday Monday.
